Doxologies [Under Construction]

Published on February 3, 2025 | By JW

What is a doxology? A doxology is a short hymn of praise to God. The word comes from the Greek word δοξολογία (doxologia), which comprises δόξα (doxa) meaning "glory," and λογία (logia), meaning "saying." The Bible is rife with doxology formulations, whether in the form of a prayer, a song, or a benediction. We'll explore some of these here.
